job_description:
Company: AILabs
Position: AI Research Engineer
Location: Boston, MA
Salary: $150,000 - $190,000

About Us:
AILabs is at the forefront of artificial intelligence research. We are developing cutting-edge AI technologies to solve real-world problems.

Job Description:
We are seeking an AI Research Engineer to conduct research and develop new AI algorithms and models. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in machine learning and deep learning.

Responsibilities:
- Conduct research in machine learning and deep learning.
- Develop and implement new AI algorithms and models.
- Publish research papers and present at conferences.
- Collaborate with other researchers and engineers.

Requirements:
- PhD in Computer Science or related field.
- 3+ years of experience in AI research.
- Proficiency in Python and machine learning libraries such as TensorFlow and PyTorch.
- Strong mathematical and statistical skills.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with reinforcement learning.
- Experience with natural language processing.

Benefits:
- Generous research budget.
- Opportunity to publish research.
- Collaborative research environment.
